settings.description:
Creating Self-sustaining Communities
For you. For your city. For the whole planet

settings.heading: Welcome to Hoolia Energy
settings.sub-heading: Revolutionizing the industry with its "Biogas solution" based on 100% renewable energy!
settings.content:
At our core, we are committed to the principles of the circular economy.

That's why we've come up with an innovative idea to repurpose waste from dairy farms and transform it into clean, renewable energy.

Our biogas energy solution harnesses the power of cow manure to produce biogas, which can then be used to heat office buildings.

We envision a future where micro-grid communities can thrive, powered by 100% renewable and recycled energy sources.

Say goodbye to the traditional centralized energy model and hello to a more sustainable future.

Watch this video for more information.

settings.heading: FROM MANURE TO ENERGY AND HEAT
settings.description: Fresh manure is pumped directly to the silo and mixed there at a constant temperature (39-42Â°C). As a result, the anaerobic organisms produce methane gas, which is diverted to the container. There we filter out the sulfur and generate energy and heat using a combustion engine and a generator. After fermentation, the digestate is more fluid. Ideal for fertilizing fields and meadows.

settings.feature_service_description: As a finite resource, natural gas reliance can lead to energy insecurity and price volatility in the long term. Our biogas energy solution provides a reliable and sustainable source of energy, reducing dependence on finite resources.

Natural gas prices are becoming increasingly volatile due to geopolitical, economic, and social changes. On the other hand, biogas production using cow manure offers a cost-effective and stable alternative energy source.

Companies that prioritize sustainability and use renewable energy sources are increasingly viewed positively by consumers and stakeholders. By adopting a biogas energy solution, companies can improve their reputation and contribute to a cleaner environment.

Governments around the world are imposing strict regulations to reduce carbon emissions. For example, the Dutch government aims to reduce CO2 emissions by 49% by 2030. Using a biogas energy solution helps companies comply with these regulations and reduce their carbon footprint.

settings.Title: Solar panels
settings.discription: Our last generation solar panels that are installed on the roof of the building drastically reduce energy costs, as they can generate electricity during peak demand periods. They are relatively low maintenance, as they do not require any moving parts and have a long lifespan. Also, They can be easily integrated with other renewable energy sources, such as wind and hydropower, to create a more robust and reliable energy system.

settings.Title: Pylontech Batteries
settings.discription:
Our last generation batteries system are modular in design, which enables us to "rack and stack" them in order to scale the nominal capacity of the solar energy storage system.


At 24 kg and 19", these batteries are smaller than the average solar battery in the market, which makes them easy to install and move.

settings.Title: Vaillant allSTOR system
settings.discription:
This multi-function buffer tank gives the possibility to accumulate and distribute any form of heating energy in an entire building. Made of steel with special coating. that makes it resistant to rust.
It is an easy plug-in installation that can connect to different types of input and output sources.

settings.Title: Air conditioning
settings.discription: Hoolia's unique solution allows you to heat your working space through water, but also using air distribution installations. Heating offices via air conditioners is an option chosen by many building owners, that is why we offer you the possibility to keep your employees warmed during winter.

settings.Title: Containers
settings.discription: Some buildings owners may not have the chance to have our datacenter incorporated directly into their offices. That's why we developed a solution. With our external containers, we offer the opportunity to profit of our energy without allocating any space inside the building.

settings.Title: High-Performance Computing
settings.discription:
High-Performance Computing (HPC) is an innovative technology that allows a highly efficient speed and quantity of calculation.
A cooling system, that immerses the equipment in a fluid, is used to reduce energy consumption and decrease maintenance costs.
The fluid used in this technology is non-conductive, for high safety purposes. Also, the heat generated by these computers is the source of energy that will warm your offices either by Water (radiator) or Air (duct).
With its compact size and very low noise production, this system is the discreetest source of energy on the market.

settings.heading: The Installation
settings.description: The material that makes the magic happen

settings.title: Rant
settings.tab-discription: We pay you rent for a corner of your utility room to setup our DataCenter Modules and rent for your roof to place solarpanels. The space you want to allocate for our system can be variable and adapted to your case.

settings.title: Savings
settings.tab-discription: Expect to save about 66% on building heating cost with our green renewable energy system.

settings.title: Subsidy
settings.tab-discription: The government guarantees a success with its SDE++ subsidy offering a guarenteed steady revenue for a much as 15 years if you use a sustainable source of energy. Following this advantage, we propose contracts from 10 to 15 years.

settings.title: Investment
settings.tab-discription:
Become 100% owner of the solar panels after 15 years.

On average, a solarpanel's lifespan is between 25 and 30 years

settings.accept_text: I agree with the terms and conditions.

settings.Title: We
settings.description: We take care of the entire project, from A to Z, ensuring a seamless process for you.

settings.Title: We
settings.description: We are in charge of all the necessary paperwork and processes to obtain subsidies to help maximize your financial benefits.

settings.Title: We
settings.description: We are in charge of all the necessary legal contracts and documentation for the installation of all the equipments, to ensure compliance with regulations.

settings.Title: We
settings.description: We take care of the installation of all necessary devices, such as batteries, HPCs, and solar panels, to help you transit to a more sustainable and efficient energy solution.

settings.Title: You
settings.description: You will enjoy the benefits of your new energy solution, including reduced energy costs and a more sustainable, environmentally-friendly way of generating energy.

settings.title: Reduced greenhouse gas emissions
settings.description: Biogas produced from cow manure is a clean energy source that can help reduce greenhouse gas emissions and mitigate climate change.

settings.title: Waste management
settings.description: Using cow manure for biogas production turns waste into a valuable resource and helps manage the environmental impacts of animal waste.

settings.title: Energy independence and economic benefits
settings.description: Biogas energy solutions offer farmers a way to become more energy independent, create jobs, and generate additional revenue streams.

settings.title: Improved soil quality
settings.description: The digestate produced from biogas production can be used as a fertilizer, improving soil quality and reducing the need for chemical fertilizers.

settings.title: Reduced odors and pollution
settings.description: Using cow manure for biogas production can reduce odors and air pollution, benefiting surrounding communities.

settings.title: Logistics advantages
settings.description: Offsets can be a costly way to reduce emissions, while on-site biogas production offers a more cost-effective solution with a financial return on investment.

settings.heading: Additional Advantages
settings.description: Some other public and financial advantages
